REPORTS OF WORKSHOPS AMD SEMINARS
2
Publ9
Noo
VU1 Public School Broadcasting (Third Allerton Seminar) - Harry Lamb, Editor
A report of the deliberations and recommendations of the seminar-
on in-school broadcasting, held at Allerton Park, University of
Illinois, June 15-24, 1952, 50 pp. Paper. $1.00
w-2 In-School Writers* Seminar - Edward Stasheff, Editor
A report of the seminar for writers of in-school radio programs
held at Station KSLH, St, Louis, Missouri, June 7-11, 1954. 36 pp.
Paper, <$1.00
vJ“5 Lincoln Lodge Seminar on Educational Television - Burton Paulu, Editor
A report of the deliberations and recommendations of leaders in the
field of educational broadcasting who gathered at the University of
Wisconsin, June 21-27, 1953, for an intensive "think session" about
educational television. June, 1953. 109 pp. Paper. $2.00
MgB First TV Production Workshop - 1953 - Edward Stasheff, Editor
Report of production workshop for persons engaged in educational
television, held at the University of Illinois, August 28-September
18, 1953. September, 1953. 112 pp. Paper. $2.00
W"7 NAEB Second TV Production Workshop - 1954 - Edward Stasheff, Editor
Report of the production workshop for persons engaged in educational
television, held at Michigan State University, August 23-September
10, 1954. An account of its lectures, demonstrations, procedures,
and projects. April, 1955. 133 pp. Paper. $2,00
W~8 MSB.First,TV Engineering Workshop - 1954 - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor
Report of the engineering workshop for technical personnel in
educational television, held in New York City, October 22-26.
1954. June, 1955. 61 pp. Paper. $2.00
W-9 NAEB Management Seminar - 1953
Report of the seminar for educational television management personnel,
held at Iowa State College. September, 1955. 42 pp. Paper. $1,00
W*“13 -NASB Third TV Production Workshop - 1955 - Edward Stasheff, Editor
Report of the production workshop for persons engaged in educational
television, held at the State University of Iowa, August 14-Seotember
3, 1955. 1956. 72 pp. Paper. $2.00
NAEB.gecond TV Engineering Workshop - 1955-Cecil S, Bidlack, Editor
Report of the engineering workshop for technical personnel in
educational television, held at Michigan State University. September
12-16, 1955. 1956. 139 pp. Paper. $2.00 '
V-16 .NAEB_Radio.Program Planning Seminar - Walt Whitaker, Editor
Report of the Radio Program Planning Seminar held at Allerton Park,
University of Illinois, April 21-24, 1957, for personnel engaged
in educational radio program planning. 1958, 88 pp. Paper. $2,00
